data.prompt: A dreamy beach sunset where soft pastel colors blend into the serene ocean, as gentle waves lap at the shore, reflecting the warmth of the fading sunlight. Silhouetted palm trees sway lightly, creating a relaxed vibe that invites listeners to unwind and embrace the moment.

An ethereal garden filled with blooming flowers in vibrant hues, their petals glistening with morning dew under a soft golden light. Butterflies smoothly dance between blossoms, embodying a sense of joy and tranquility tinged with a hint of nostalgia.

A cozy room bathed in golden hour sunlight where a vinyl record spins softly on an old turntable, casting flickering shadows on the walls. Plush cushions and warm blankets invite relaxation, creating an intimate atmosphere of contentment and reflection.
